description: Beginner Front End developer. I'm mostly interested in React but i have some experience with Node.js and MongoDB as well. Additionaly, i've been using TypeScript, Redux, Firebase and GraphQL. One of my main goals is to reach the senior level and to further develop my programming skills. In free time, i'm learning Japanese. I strive (or at least i'm trying) to be fluent in this language. In the future, i have plans to learn Korean too. (Which i've been learning before)

projects.vocupractice: Web site to help with learning vocabulary
projects.video-v2: Video upload, authorization, playlists, channels, admin panel.
projects.korean-practice: Korean language help, authorization, account, words save, tests.
projects.notes: Creating notes, tags, favorites, user account, editor, trash.
projects.chat-v2: Authorization, accounts, youtube videos, multiple chats, links.
projects.windows: Creating files, playing videos, music and pictures, calculator, terminal, paint
